name: GLOW UP
description:
Procedurally generated mayhem. (Neon included)

The hit indie game you've never heard of, essentially depicting Subway Surfers if it was set in a futuristic nightclub.

GLOW UP is an infinite runner game, where the goal (for now) is to set as many records as you can, through completing a series of infinte procedural levels.

 The game features entirely original content such as:

  • Shooty things!
  • Mines!
  • Other miscellaneous primitive shapes that hurt you!

My first ever finished game as a hobbyist, hope you enjoy it x)
